description:
After everyone discovers the truth about Cyan, Maple proposes a training camp as they prepare new songs for the Grateful Rock Festival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ba-dump!? It`s a Beach Training Camp Full of Swimsuits
DOKIィッ!?水着だらけの海合宿♡ですぞ♪
Dokii!? Mizugi Darake no Umi Gasshuku Desu zo
